name: PNat.dist_eq
initialProofState:
x y : PNat
⊢ Eq (Dist.dist x y) (abs (HSub.hSub ↑↑x ↑↑y))
decl: theorem dist_eq (x y : ℕ+) : dist x y = |(↑x : ℝ) - ↑y| := rfl

name: PNat.dist_coe
initialProofState:
x y : PNat
⊢ Eq (Dist.dist ↑x ↑y) (Dist.dist x y)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem dist_coe (x y : ℕ+) : dist (↑x : ℕ) (↑y : ℕ) = dist x y := rfl

name: PNat.isUniformEmbedding_coe
decl: theorem isUniformEmbedding_coe : IsUniformEmbedding ((↑) : ℕ+ → ℕ) := isUniformEmbedding_subtype_val

name: PNat.instDiscreteTopology
decl: instance : DiscreteTopology ℕ+ := inferInstanceAs (DiscreteTopology { n : ℕ // 0 < n })

name: PNat.instProperSpace
decl:
instance : ProperSpace ℕ+ where
  isCompact_closedBall n r := by
    change IsCompact (((↑) : ℕ+ → ℕ) ⁻¹' closedBall (↑n : ℕ) r)
    rw [Nat.closedBall_eq_Icc]
    exact ((Set.finite_Icc _ _).preimage PNat.coe_injective.injOn).isCompact

name: PNat.instNoncompactSpace
decl:
instance : NoncompactSpace ℕ+ :=
  noncompactSpace_of_neBot <| by simp only [Filter.cocompact_eq_cofinite, Filter.cofinite_neBot]
